document_data.mainbody:
Spider hounds were predatory creatures found in the wild-magic zones of the Helmlands.
A spider hound appeared as a yellow three-headed dog with eight spider-like legs.
Spider hounds preyed on the white-skinned creatures that shared their habitat.
Spider hounds started appearing in northeastern Cormyr during the Time of Troubles.
In Kythorn of the , a large pack of more than twenty spider hounds attacked Adon, Caitlan Moonsong, Cyric, Kelemvor Lyonsbane and Midnight as they were traveling through a wild-magic zone en route from Arabel to Castle Kilgrave. The spider hounds ended up being driven off by Adon, who had given his horse a potion of speed and stormed the pack wielding his warhammer to great effect.
